duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee and direct operations for world-class integrated supply chain projects.
Assess project issues and develop enhanced resolutions to meet or exceed productivity, quality, and customer satisfaction goals.
Build relationships and better understand areas that inhibit productivity and effectiveness, and develop solutions to address those issues.
Manage activities to support the data load process, current analytics projects, and dashboards with team members.
Lead projects technically and improve the skill sets of team members to advance analytical capabilities.
Develop and enable delivery mechanisms for comprehensive, actionable analytics identifying improvement opportunities for all functions.
Process standardization and documentation across all projects.
Monthly connect, newsletter, focus training for users, tableau subscriptions for every functions, and functional training for team members.
Due to compliance with U.S. export control laws and regulations, candidate must be a U.S. citizen, U.S. permanent resident, or have asylum or refugee status in the U.S.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or Business
